/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is teeming with life, filled with cars and pedestrians going about their day. Buildings line the sides of the street, their architecture a blend of modern and traditional styles, reflecting the city's rich history and its march towards the future. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the city.
